# Mobile Code Obfuscation

In this section of the Appdome Knowledge Base, learn to build Certified Secure™ mobile code obfuscation in Android & iOS apps using Appdome's DevSecOps automation platform in your mobile CI/CD pipeline. Save time and avoid manual integration, complex exclusion files and more. Use Appdome to fully automate the build, test, and release lifecycle of code obfuscation of Android & iOS app binaries, app logic, file systems, function calls, method and class names, control flows, debug information, and more quickly and easily. If you don't find what you're looking for in this section of the knowledge base, enter your inquiry in the search field or contact [support.appdome.com](https://support.appdome.com/).
